inclusion.criterion: Signed informed consent must be obtained prior to participation in the study.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Adults ≥18 years of age upon entry into screening.
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Patient diagnosed with chronic and high -frequency episodic migraine (with or without aura) for at least 1 year prior to screening according to the International Classification of Headache Disorders-3rd Edition (ICHD-3).
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient with a documented diagnosis in clinical history of one or more of the following comorbidities: chronic fatigue, fibromyalgia and/or IBS.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Patients previously treated with other monoclonal antibodies for migraine can be included if the appropriate washout period according to product half-life has been done for each monoclonal antibody.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Migraine frequency of ≥ 10 migraine days during the Baseline Epoch, confirmed by the eDiary.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: ≥ 80% eDiary compliance during the Baseline Epoch.
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Older than 50 years of age at migraine onset.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Unable to differentiate migraine from other headaches.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: History of cluster headache or hemiplegic migraine headache.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Used a device, or procedure within 2 months prior to the start of or during baseline or during the treatment period.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Use of other investigational drugs within 5 half-lives of enrollment or inappropriate washout period in case of monoclonal antibodies, or until the expected pharmacodynamic effect has returned to baseline, whichever is longer.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Unlikely to be able to complete all protocol required study visits or procedures, and/or to comply with all required study procedures.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: History or evidence of any other unstable or clinically significant medical condition that in the opinion of the investigator would pose a risk to subject safety or interfere with the study evaluation, procedures, or completion.
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient is a 15 year old girl with recurrent bilateral headache. She has been diagnosed with migraine and is under treatment.
